video_prompt: Man walks on a winding flour path towards a glowing, bun-shaped house. Windows subtly brighten, and particles drift from the house, settling on the path.  Subtle shadows under the man and flour path shift.
image_prompt: Whimsical, surreal image: A man with a backpack walks on a fluffy white flour path towards a giant, glowing steamed bun house. Pristine white background, soft lighting.
refined_video_prompt: A man strides forward. Windows on the distant house subtly brighten. Luminescent particles drift from the house, settling onto the ground the man traverses. Shadows beneath the man and along the winding ground gently shift and lengthen with his progression.
